summary: Workout/progress tracking app deployed via Internet Computer canister link, intended to be used on iPhone via Safari/Add to Home Screen.
architectural_notes: App is deployed as an Internet Computer canister and accessed via an icp0.io canister URL (PWA-style add-to-home-screen on iPhone).
known_issues: iPhone/Safari opening the app link shows error 400: "Canister ID not resolved" (link/canister resolution or caching/expired deployment issue).

existing_features.title: Add a new chart on the Progress screen to visualize workout progress over time (e.g., a simple bar/line chart showing completed vs not completed per day for the last 30 days), in addition to the existing Weight Progress chart.
Implement a frontend data hook to fetch workout completion status for a date range and use it to power the Workout Progress chart.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a graph/chart view to show the userâ€™s progress over time.

Fix/complete the backend date-range workout completion query so it returns real completion data for the authenticated caller between the provided startDate and endDate (inclusive) instead of hardcoded placeholder dates.

projectName: Add a progress graph chart for workout completion over time
